data.description: <strong>About Us<br><br></strong>We’re the world’s leading provider of secure financial messaging services, headquartered in Belgium. We are the way the world moves value – across borders, through cities and overseas. No other organisation can address the scale, precision, pace and trust that this demands, and we’re proud to support the global economy.<br><br>We’re unique too. We were established to find a better way for the global financial community to move value – a reliable, safe and secure approach that the community can trust, completely. We’re always striving to be better and are constantly evolving in an ever-changing landscape, without undermining that trust. Five decades on, our vibrant community reflects the complexity and diversity of the financial ecosystem. We innovate diligently, test exhaustively, then implement fast. In a connected and exciting era, our mission has never been more relevant. Swift now has a presence in 200+ countries and legal territories to serve a community of more than 12,000 banks and financial institutions.<br><br>We’re the world’s leading provider of secure financial messaging services, headquartered in Belgium. We are the way the world moves value – across borders, through cities and overseas. No other organization can address the scale, precision, pace and trust that this demands, and we’re proud to support the global economy.<br><br>We’re unique too. We were established to find a better way for the global financial community to move value – a reliable, safe and secure approach that the community can trust, completely. We’re always striving to be better and are constantly evolving in an ever-changing landscape, without undermining that trust. Five decades on, our vibrant community reflects the complexity and diversity of the financial ecosystem. We innovate diligently, test exhaustively, then implement fast. In a connected and exciting era, our mission has never been more relevant. Swift now has a presence in 200+ countries and legal territories to serve a community of more than 12,000 banks and financial institutions.<br><br>Are you interested in gaining real-world, hands on, project-based experience in Summer 2026? Are you seeking a chance to explore the API and Identity world?<br><br>Based in Tysons, VA, you will be part of Swift’s 10-week internship in the API and Identity team. Our team enables cross border transactions through APIs, we manage Swift's API platforms. The roles and responsibilities include development, testing, and operations. If you are interested in learning the API lifecycle management and governance, in addition to the technical skills needed for development and test automation on API Platforms, come and join us!<br><br>During your internship, you will work alongside a mentor and with a team who will help you experience how Swift works with its clients to make cross-border payments instant and frictionless.<br><br>At this time, Swift is not able to offer relocation or housing to interns.<br><br><strong>Program Highlights: <br><br></strong><ul><li>Robust, real-world projects</li><li>Professional Development and Networking Opportunities</li><li>Ten Week program, June 1nd — August 7th</li><li>Hourly rate: $38/hour<br><br><br></li></ul><strong>Qualifications: <br><br></strong><ul><li>Must be authorized to work in the US without sponsorship. </li><li>Be a rising junior or senior. <br><br><br></li></ul><strong>Major: </strong>Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or relevant discipline.<br><br><strong>Job Description:<br><br></strong><ul><li>APIs, access and identity management. </li><li>Build API solutions to empower the API platform products. </li><li>Development work involves all or some of the following: Java, JavaScript, Python. </li><li>UI design and development using frameworks like AngularJs. </li><li>Be part of an agile team, following agile methodology best practices. <br><br><br></li></ul><strong>Project Description:<br><br></strong><ul><li>Migrating RichFaces to PrimeFaces. </li><li>Front end development using PrimeFaces</li><li>API Operational Excellence. <br><br><br></li></ul><strong>Additional Job Description<br><br></strong><strong>Skills &amp; tools:<br><br></strong><ul><li>Java</li><li>Springboot</li><li>JavaScript</li><li>RHEL</li><li>Maven</li><li>Git</li><li>UI development: HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. </li><li>Open API spec</li><li>IDE</li><li>Postman<br><br><br></li></ul><strong>Preferred:<br><br></strong><ul><li>Cloudbees</li><li>Bitbucket</li><li>Jira</li><li>Agile methodologies</li><li>Shell scripting<br><br><br></li></ul><strong>What We Offer<br><br></strong>We put you in control of career<br><br>We give you a competitive package<br><br>We help you perform at your best<br><br>We help you make a difference<br><br>We give you the freedom to be yourself<br><br><em>We give you the freedom to be yourself. We are creating an environment of unique individuals – like you – with different perspectives on the financial industry and the world. A diverse and inclusive environment in which everyone’s voice counts and where you can reach your full potential.<br><br></em><em>If you believe you require a reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, please contact us to request accommodation.<br><br></em><em>Don’t meet every single requirement? At Swift, we are dedicated to building a workplace where people can bring their full selves and ideas to the team, so if you are excited about this role, we encourage you to apply even if you do not meet every single qualification.</em>
